hero.title: Open-source
hero.subtitle: We develop open-source solutions to improve education. We help businesses, schools, universities and content creators to offer better learning experiences.

metadata.title: Zoonk: Open-source solutions for education
metadata.description: Zoonk provides open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

twitter.title: Zoonk
twitter.description: We provide open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

questions.title: Support
questions.description: You can ask general questions about our products on our community forum.

sales.title: Sales or partnerships
sales.description: If you want to talk about sales or partnerships, please send an email to hello@zoonk.org.

metadata.title: Contact us - Zoonk
metadata.description: Reach out to the Zoonk team.

why.title: Why do we exist?
why.subtitle: Everything we do requires us to learn something but learning isn't always easy or fun. We want to change that.
why.content_1: We're building open-source tools to improve how we learn.
why.content_2:
Learning should be fun.
Learning should be practical.
Learning should be easy.
Learning should be accessible.
why.content_3: By improving how we learn things, we want to empower a new generation of builders. If we can fix education, then we can fix everything else.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: Provide high-quality, hands-on and affordable education to every single person on Earth.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.subtitle: We want to help build a world where learning is fun, where everyone understands how science works, where we have a new generation of builders solving the world's biggest problems, where open-source and transparency become a key part of our society.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Everything we do is public. We don't have secrets. We're honest, open, direct and we always tell the truth.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: We're responsible for our actions. We don't blame others. We're self-organized. We don't need permission to do things.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We care about people. We don't tolerate discrimination, harassment, and asshole geniuses.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We're proud of our work. We don't ship crap. We care.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We avoid over-engineering. We don't make things more complicated than they need to be.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We're always learning. We don't know everything. We admit our mistakes.

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.description: We share our knowledge. We don't keep secrets. We are not afraid of competition.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We help each other. We control our egos. We value collaboration over competition.

metadata.title: About us - Zoonk
metadata.description: Learn more about Zoonk and our mission.

wikaro.title: For businesses
wikaro.description: Create interactive guides to engage your employees and attract new customers. It’s easier, faster and cheaper than making video lessons.

educasso.title: For schools
educasso.description: Create fun, interactive lessons with real-life examples and aligned with the AP curriculum. Save time on lesson planning.

wisek.title: For creators
wisek.description: Create interactive courses and earn money. It's easier and faster than producing videos. We only charge you a small comission fee.

uneebee.title: Open-source
uneebee.description: Open-source tool for creating interactive courses like Duolingo. Install it on your servers and own your data. MIT license.
